mapper.select: select history_code from history where user_id = #{userId} order by update_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into history (user_id, history_code, history_json, request_json, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{historyCode}, #{historyJson}, #{requestJson}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update history set history_json = #{historyJson}, request_json = #{requestJson}, update_time = now() where user_id = #{userId} and history_code = #{historyCode}
